Experience Front End Developer NJM Insurance Group West Trenton NJ May 2014 to Present Project Insurance Policy Application Description 73 2 7 9 0 2 2 4 1 karlhuioutlookcom New Jersey Manufacturers Insurance Company began in 1913 founded by factory owners who wanted to purchase insurance from a reliable local safetyoriented carrier The Company has worked steadily ever since to build a reputation for efficiency integrity and superior service Insurance policy application is a web based thin client to view a policy summary make changes to it quote changes make payments and get forms and documents Policy summary offer a comprehensive view of the policy including driver vehicle and coverage information The application can be used to make payments online show claims activity and use the resource center which provides information like insurance 101 vehicle info driving safety etc Responsibilities Involved in creating the UI screens and a dynamic website model Created neat and userfriendly webpage using HTML5 and CSS3 JS and jQuery Created responsive webpage to different platforms by applying Bootstrap CSS Implemented MVC architecture using Angular JS Implemented Credit Card payment interface using JavaScript and Angular JS Factories Routing Filters and Factories Designing user information page by creating Angular Templates using Angular UI BootStrap Filling up the Web Applications using CSS3 Media Queries and CSS BootStrap Performed Unit Testing using tools like QUnit and Protractor Used AJAX calls for data updates in UI along with JSON data parsing Optimized HTML and JavaScript code to reduce web page loading time Involved in debugging HTML CSS and JS code using tools such as Chrome Inspector Firefox Firebug IE Tester protractor Resolved CrossBrowser issues for Chrome Mozilla Firefox Internet Explorer and Safari Collaborated with teammates and updated application versions using SVN Involved in website maintenance and support Environment HTMLHTML5
